about_the_game:
Things are heating up and the Sun is blazing during Summers out in the Wild West. Cool down and have some fun with the West Hunt Summer Pack! Even a hardworking Sheriff can find time to relax in the Tourist skin, or stay active in the Sporty skin! Too hot out for the dog? Have a little chicken, duck, or rooster follow you around instead! Whether you’re busy keeping the streets clean, or causing chaos wherever you go, take a little dance break in the nice Summer evenings. Included are 4 new Dance Emotes: Hip hop, Swing Dance, Silly Dance, and the YMCA!

All items in the pack are cosmetic only and do not change gameplay mechanics or provide any gameplay advantages.

Sheriff Skin: Tourist - 2 variations, Male and Female
Sun hat, cool shirt, shorts, and sandals - check! It might be time for vacation, but as every Sheriff knows - crime never takes a break! Better catch those Outlaws soon so you can vacation around without worry!

Sheriff Skin: Sporty - 2 variations, Male and Female
It’s time for that Summer body! Easily get those steps in while you’re walking around town with the Sporty set! The workout clothes will have you looking and performing at your best!

Pet: Chicken
Why did the chicken cross the road? To look for Outlaws of course!

Pet: Duck - 2 variations, Green and White
Quack! Quack! Who wouldn’t want to have a cute little Duck waddle along with them?

Pet: Black Rooster
Ever seen these guys fight? Roosters are just as tough as you are!

4 Dance Emotes: Hip hop, Swing Dance, Silly Dance, YMCA
Summer is the perfect time for music and dancing! Add a little personality and show off your style with 4 unique dances!

name: West Hunt - Summer Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Intel i3-5005U -AMD 3015Ce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Summer DLC with cute pets and skins
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian
*languages with full audio support
